text: Charles Carson (16 August 1885 – 5 August 1977) was a British actor. A civil engineer before taking to the stage in 1919, his theatre work included directed plays for ENSA during WWII. ==Selected filmography== * The Loves of Ariane (1931) – The Professor * Dreyfus (1931) – Col.
